r.s: PEAR2_Exception is the standard exception class for PEAR2.
r.d:
In addition to supporting the default signature of the built-in Exception class, PEAR2_Exception also supports passing a cause of an exception, which can be another exception object or a PEAR2_MultiErrors object. The error messages of the causes are used when constructing the error message displayed when converting PEAR2_Exception to a string.
PEAR2_Exception should always be extended by your own custom exception class for the package.
